魻字的基本解释

魻
xiá
〔魻鲽（
zh?）〕重叠，如“魻魻参差”。

魻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiá］
［《集韻》轄甲切，入狎，匣。］
鱼名。
[②]［xiā］
［《集韻》迄甲切，入狎，曉。］
见“魻2鰈”。

魻字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魻； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1467第07
【集韻】轄甲切，音狎。魚名。又【集韻】迄甲切，音呷。魻鰈，鱗次衆多貌。【潘岳·笙賦】魻鰈參差。【註】魻鰈，裝飾重疊貌。

魻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
魻字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Drunk
xiá
〔魻魻齻(
zh?)] overlap, such as "staggered".
Drunk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiá］
["Jiyun" governs Jiaqi, enters 狎, box. ]
The name of the fish.
[②]［xiā］
["Jiyun" reaches Jiaqie, enters 狎, dawns. ]
See "Pier 2 plaice".
Drunk
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魻; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1467 Page 07
[Jiyun] Jurisdiction over Jiaqie, Yinxie. The name of the fish. Also 【Jiyun】Till Jiaqie, the sound is sip. The flounder has many appearances. 【Pan Yue·Sheng Fu】The flounder is uneven. [Note] Flat flounder, decorated with overlapping appearance.
